attributes.action: Legalise the use of Cannabis in the UK to help the economy and the people.
attributes.additional_details: Legalisation of Cannabis WILL help the economy and the mental health of people during the lockdown. The UK has seen the many struggles we are facing during the pandemic, most importantly the economy. Legalisation of Cannabis will solve the issue and bring millions into the economy. Cannibas also has health benefits to many people and is proven to be much more safer than alcohol. Cannibas will also help the mental health issues people are suffering during this tough period.
attributes.background: To legalise the use of recreational Cannabis in the U.K.
